Shiva Oswal.description: Shiva (CS '26) is the director of education at poker club. He enjoys the analytical side of poker, and is interested in the burgeoning field of poker AI.

Mason Stark.description: Mason (ECE '25) has been an active figure in CMU poker club since his freshman year, helping to facilitate and run club events. Outside of poker, he loves Hip Hop, skiing, mountain biking, and coding.

Jeffery Guo.description: Jeffery (Econ '27) has been instrumental in introducing poker to underclassmen at CMU.

Oliver Zhang.description: Oliver (CS '26) helps to organize and run tournaments more frequently.

Anya Bindra.description: Anya (ECE '25) enjoys the strategic decision-making process of poker and joined the club to organize more games and play in tournaments. In her free time, she likes traveling, hiking and investing.

Nick Caggiano.description: Nick (Business '26) enjoys making poker videos under the name @J7enjoyer and promotes the game through his entertaining and educational content.

Lillian Hao.description: Lillian (HCI and Business '25) has been in the Poker Club since her junior year, and she helps organize club events and the club's social media. She enjoys dance, skiing, and watching movies/Youtube in her free time.

Steve Lee.description: Steve (ChemE '27) helps improve the social aspect of poker club.
